Name: Emberheart Salamander
Story Background: Born from the heart of volcanic infernos, the Emberheart Salamander is a creature of searing flames and untamed ferocity. Its fiery presence is a symbol of elemental power and relentless heat.
Ability: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.), When Emberheart Salamander enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to any target.
Appearance Description: The Emberheart Salamander is a blazing, reptilian creature wreathed in flickering flames and molten embers that trail behind its swift movements. Its eyes burn with smoldering intensity, and its every step leaves scorched marks upon the earth it traverses.
